alert.note: Alert for Central Willamette Valley; Greater Portland Metro Area (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued January 26 at 5:10PM PST until January 31 at 10:03AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Portland OR has issued a Flood Watch for the following rivers in Oregon... Pudding River at Aurora. ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE SATURDAY NIGHT TO LATE WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...Pudding River at Aurora. * WHEN...From late Saturday night to late Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...Above 22.0 feet, expect minor flooding of low-lying agricultural lands and access roads along the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:00 PM PST Friday the stage was 21.2 feet. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached early Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: If you are in the watch area, remain alert to possible flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Saturday morning at 600 AM PST.

area.areaDesc: Central Willamette Valley; Greater Portland Metro Area
